title: Why can't I add my logo to my Gmail account on Pixel3 but had no issue on iphone?
content:
It's so frustrating that I can't add my business logos to my Gmail accounts on my Pixel3. It wasn't a problem on my iPhone. 
I use my Pixel3 for work and am seriously considering reverting to apple, purely because of this issue. 
I reported this when I first got the phone but nothing has happened and nobody can help. 
Who doesn't use their phone for work? 
Does anyone know anything about this matter that Google doesn't please?
